title: Roberto Orci, Co-Creator of Fringe and Sleepy Hollow, Dead at 51
description: Hollywood screenwriter Roberto Orci, whose many credits included co-creating Fox’s Fringe and Sleepy Hollow and CBS’ Hawaii Five-0, has died at the age of 51, TVLine has confirmed. Orci died Tuesday at his Los Angeles home following a battle with kidney disease. “He was a visionary storyteller with a boundless heart and a beautiful soul,” […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Sunday Ratings: Tracker and Watson Grow, Suits LA Opens Low
description: In the latest TV show ratings, CBS’ Tracker was Sunday’s most-watched program and tied for the nightly demo win. CBS | Leading out of 60 Minutes (6.6 million total viewers and a 0.4 demo rating), Tracker (8 mil/0.4) posted its biggest audience in three episodes and held steady in the demo. Watson (4.6 mil/0.3) also […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Law & Order: SVU Season 26 Episode 13 Round Table: Was Benson Being Reasonable?
